name: Not Your Grandma's Escape Room
description:
Controls: 

Left-click to shoot.

WASD to control player 

Spacebar to jump (can press twice to double jump)

Story:

You are a random citzien who wanted some thrill in their life, so you decided to partake in an escape room. Little did you know, failing the puzzles has fatal consequenes....

Credits: 

I made everything in this level except for the materials (exluding the color brown, gold, silver, and light brown), shooting audio, and the classical song. I used the Unreal Egine 4 first person shooter blueprint as a basis for the game.
